${ModID}:Simplify.NAME: Simplify
${ModID}:Simplify.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! ${ModID}:Basic card and Upgrade it. This can Upgrade it any number of times.
${ModID}:Simplify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! ${ModID}:Basic cards and Upgrade them. This can Upgrade them any number of times.

${ModID}:LoseIt.NAME: Lose It
${ModID}:LoseIt.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add a *Rummage to your hand. Set the cost of your *Rummages to !M!. Exhaust.
${ModID}:LoseIt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add a *Rummage+ to your hand. Set the cost of your *Rummages to !M!. Exhaust.

${ModID}:SimplifiedStrike.NAME: Simplified Strike
${ModID}:SimplifiedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! more damage for each of your ${ModID}:Basic cards.

${ModID}:PerfectBasics.NAME: Perfect Basics
${ModID}:PerfectBasics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a ${ModID}:Basic card, Upgrade it this combat. This can Upgrade them any number of times.

${ModID}:BasicSupply.NAME: Basic Supply
${ModID}:BasicSupply.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you play a ${ModID}:Basic card each turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:BasicPoison.NAME: Basic Poison
${ModID}:BasicPoison.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you play a ${ModID}:Basic card this turn, apply !M! Poison to all enemies.

${ModID}:FamiliarKit.NAME: Familiar Kit
${ModID}:FamiliarKit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, !M! Dexterity and !${ModID}:m2! Focus. ${ModID}:Pickup: Obtain a *Bash, *Survivor and *Zap.
${ModID}:FamiliarKit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength, !M! Dexterity and !${ModID}:m2! Focus. ${ModID}:Pickup: Obtain a *Bash, *Survivor and *Zap.

${ModID}:BackToBasic.NAME: Back To Basic
${ModID}:BackToBasic.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw !M! ${ModID}:Basic cards. Gain [E] .
${ModID}:BackToBasic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw !M! ${ModID}:Basic cards. Gain [E] [E] .
